name: Lightless Mass
description: A fragment produced from the intense battle against the All-Devouring Narwhal.  The universe is a dark and cold place.  But look carefully. Inside are always faint glimmers of light, like pearlsgleaming from within the sand, splinters of diamond sprinkled over asphalt,lights lancing through the fog on a misty night, and sparks that ignite thebrightest blazes.
